title: DataFrame two-way-table
text:
Note



生成 two-way-table

使用unstack方法生成双向表
使用combine 方法添加列
使用insert 方法添加行




include("../utils.jl")
using  RCall
using  GLMakie,DataFrames,Pipe,PrettyTables
using  StatsBase,TableTransforms,Random,TimeSeries,Dates
Random.seed!(34343)

TaskLocalRNG()



1. load data

 desc=Stat2Table(1431,"FranticFingers","stock time series",["Date", "Price", "Change", "Volume"])
 data=@pipe load_rda(desc.name)
 display(first(data,5))

5×4 DataFrame



Row
ID
Rate
Subj
Drug



Int32
Int32
Cat…
Cat…




1
1
11
A
Pl


2

56
B
Pl

Pl

6
D
Pl


5
5
26
A
Ca








2. two-way-table
:Subj 做为列, :Drug 作为行,  :Rate 是值

twoway_table=unstack(data,:Subj,:Drug,:Rate)

4×4 DataFrame



Row
Subj
Pl

Th

twt=combine(twoway_table,:,[:Pl,:Ca,:Th]=>((a,b,c)->mean([a,b,c]))=>:Ave)

title: using DataFrame construct cotingencytable
text:
Note



cotingencytable是理解和研究条件概率的工具

ref:
列联表(双向表,cotingencytable,two-way table),是研究两个变量 不同水平(变量取值)之间相互关系的图表展示方法
表中最大行和最大列是边缘分布
表中单元格取值是两个变量的联合分布
手动输入可以使用:
include("../utils.jl")
using  DataFrames
using  Random
Random.seed!(34343)

TaskLocalRNG()

title: using DataFrame construct cotingencytable
text:
1. load data

 desc=Stat2Table(0,"flavor_preference","icecream flavor",[])
 data=@pipe load_csv(desc.name)
 show(first(data,10))

6×4 DataFrame
 Row │ Gender   Flavor      Frequency  Row%    
     │ String7  String15    Int64      Float64 
─────┼─────────────────────────────────────────
   1 │ Female   Chocolate          37     56.0
   2 │ Female   Strawberry         17     25.8
   3 │ Female   Vanilla            12     18.2
   4 │ Male     Chocolate          21     29.6
   5 │ Male     Strawberry         18     25.4
   6 │ Male     Vanilla            32     45.0

title: using DataFrame construct cotingencytable
text:
2. two-way-table
:Gender 做为列, :Flavour 作为行,  :Frequency 是值

twoway_table=unstack(data,:Gender,:Flavor,:Frequency)

2×4 DataFrame



Row
Gender
Chocolate
Strawberry
Vanilla



String7
Int64?
Int64?
Int64?




1
Female
37
17
12


2
Male
21
18
32

title: using DataFrame construct cotingencytable
text:
3. add :Total Col

twt=combine(twoway_table,:,[:Chocolate,:Strawberry,:Vanilla]=>((a,b,c)->sum([a,b,c]))=>:Total)

2×5 DataFrame



Row
Gender
Chocolate
Strawberry
Vanilla
Total

Int64?
Int64

Female
37
17
12
66


2
Male
21
18
32
71

title: using DataFrame construct cotingencytable
text:
4. add :Total Row

insert!(twt, 3 ,["Total",sum.(eachcol(twt)[2:end])...])

3×5 DataFrame



Row
Gender
Chocolate
Strawberry
Vanilla

Total
58
35

5. read table
建立表格后,就可以用来计算条件概率,按照dataframe的行列读取方式


5.1 边缘概率
统计参加试验的女性总人数

 "参加实验的女性总人数"=>twt[1,:Total]

"参加实验的女性总人数" => 66


计算试验中喜欢巧克力口味冰激凌的总人数

 "喜欢巧克力冰激凌总人数"=>twt[3,:Chocolate]

"喜欢巧克力冰激凌总人数" => 58


参加试验的总数

"参加试验的总数"=>twt[3,:Total]

"参加试验的总数" => 137

title: DataFramesMeta Tutorial
text:
Note



mammal sleep tutorial



include("../utils.jl")
using  RCall
using  GLMakie,DataFrames,Pipe,PrettyTables,DataFramesMeta
using  StatsBase,TableTransforms,Random,TimeSeries,Dates
Random.seed!(34343)

TaskLocalRNG()



1. load data

 desc=Stat2Table(1431,"mammals","sleep in mammals",[])
 msleep=@pipe load_rda(desc.name)
 show(first(msleep,10))

10×11 DataFrame
 Row │ species                 body_wt   brain_wt  non_dreaming  dreaming   to ⋯
     │ Cat…                    Float64   Float64   Float64?      Float64?   Fl ⋯
─────┼──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   1 │ Africanelephant         6654.0      5712.0     missing    missing       ⋯
   2 │ Africangiantpouchedrat     1.0         6.6           6.3        2.0
   3 │ ArcticFox                  3.385      44.5     missing    missing   
   4 │ Arcticgroundsquirrel       0.92        5.7     missing    missing   
   5 │ Asianelephant           2547.0      4603.0           2.1        1.8     ⋯
   6 │ Baboon                    10.55      179.5           9.1        0.7
   7 │ Bigbrownbat                0.023       0.3          15.8        3.9
   8 │ Braziliantapir           160.0       169.0           5.2        1.0
   9 │ Cat                        3.3        25.6          10.9        3.6     ⋯
  10 │ Chimpanzee                52.16      440.0           8.3        1.4
                                                               6 columns omitted




2. names

show(names(msleep))

["species", "body_wt", "brain_wt", "non_dreaming", "dreaming", "total_sleep", "life_span", "gestation", "predation", "exposure", "danger"]




3. Selecting Columns Using @select

@select msleep :species :total_sleep
